/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements that add a lively touch to the scene. Cars and pedestrians animate the street, contributing to the dynamic atmosphere. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the colors of the cityscape.
